xwikidoc.title: Mail Archive Translations
xwikidoc.content:
# XObject : mail MailArchiveCode.MailClass_topicsubject=Topic MailArchiveCode.MailClass_topicid=Topic ID MailArchiveCode.MailClass_messagesubject=Subject MailArchiveCode.MailClass_messageid=Message ID MailArchiveCode.MailClass_date=Date MailArchiveCode.MailClass_body=Body MailArchiveCode.MailClass_from=From MailArchiveCode.MailClass_to=To MailArchiveCode.MailClass_cc=CC MailArchiveCode.MailClass_references=References MailArchiveCode.MailClass_inreplyto=InReplyTo ID MailArchiveCode.MailClass_bodyhtml=HTML Body MailArchiveCode.MailClass_attachedMails=Attached Mails MailArchiveCode.MailClass_type=Mail Type MailArchiveCode.MailClass_sensitivity=Sensitivity # XObject : topic MailArchiveCode.MailTopicClass_topicid=Topic ID MailArchiveCode.MailTopicClass_subject=Subject MailArchiveCode.MailTopicClass_startdate=Created MailArchiveCode.MailTopicClass_lastupdatedate=Last Updated MailArchiveCode.MailTopicClass_status=Status MailArchiveCode.MailTopicClass_author=Author MailArchiveCode.MailTopicClass_sensitivity=Sensitivity MailArchiveCode.MailTopicClass_type=Topic Type
mailarchive_settings_title=Settings for the Mail Archive application mailarchive_home_title=Mailing-lists Archive Application mailarchive_home_description=This application aims at backuping the "DL GGS WW" and Communities mailing-lists, and allowing you to browse them by subject / mail, or find these topics by using the basic wiki search. Please find the list below - it's updated regularly, please come back later if you don't see a recent mail. mailarchive_loading_title=Mailing-lists eMail Loading mailarchive_loading_description=This page will allow you to load emails from your configured mailbox(es). Simulation will do everything except effectively saving mails and topics pages. Checking debug mode allows to set log level to DEBUG for this loading session.
# Loading operations mailarchive.load.maxMailsNb.label=Max number of mails to load in a session mailarchive.load.maxMailsNb.hint=Enter -1 to load all mails - can be very slow mailarchive.load.debugMode.label=Debug Mode mailarchive.load.simulate.label=Simulate mailarchive.load.loadAll.label=Load all mails (including already read mails) mailarchive.load.recentMails.label=Focus on Recent mails mailarchive.load.withDelete.label=Delete mails after successful load mailarchive.load.load.submit=Load mailarchive.load.check.submit=Check mailarchive.load.switch.submit=Switch State mailarchive.load.table.headers.server=Server mailarchive.load.table.headers.state=State mailarchive.load.table.headers.available=Nb Mails available mailarchive.load.table.headers.actions=Actions mailarchive.load.schedule.setParameters.submit=Use parameters from top of this page for scheduled job
mailarchive_loading_confirm=Confirm loading mails mailarchive_loading_confirm_withdelete=Confirm and delete loading mails mailarchive_loading_connect_failure=Failed to connect to mail server mailarchive_loading_failure=Failed to load emails. Check the debug information mailarchive_loading_success=Emails have been treated successfully. Already loaded emails have not been deleted. # Archive livetable column headers mailarchive.topics.table.headers.subject=Subject mailarchive.topics.table.headers.startdate=Created mailarchive.topics.table.headers.lastupdatedate=Updated mailarchive.topics.table.headers.count=Messages mailarchive.topics.table.headers.author=Author mailarchive.topics.table.headers.emptyvalue=unknown mailarchive.topics.table.headers._ratings=Ratings # Servers mailarchive.server.table.headers.id=ID mailarchive.server.table.headers.hostname=Host Name mailarchive.server.table.headers.protocol=Protocol mailarchive.server.table.headers.folder=Folder mailarchive.server.table.headers.user=Account mailarchive.server.table.headers.status=Status mailarchive.server.table.headers.state=State mailarchive.server.table.headers._actions=Actions mailarchive.server.connectionStatus.ok=Ok mailarchive.server.connectionStatus.-1=Authentication failed mailarchive.server.connectionStatus.-2=Connection error mailarchive.server.connectionStatus.-3=Illegal State mailarchive.server.connectionStatus.-4=Unexpected error mailarchive.server.connectionStatus.-5=Folder not found mailarchive.server.connectionStatus.-6=Unknown Host mailarchive.server.connectionStatus.-7=Unknown Error mailarchive.server.connectionStatus.-8=Invalid Configuration mailarchive.server.connectionStatus.description.ok=Successfully connected, there are {0} unread messages on this server / folder. mailarchive.server.connectionStatus.description.-1=Authentication failed, check your account settings, or need for a specific certificate for Javamail. mailarchive.server.connectionStatus.description.-2=Could not connect to this server, check logs for more details. mailarchive.server.connectionStatus.description.-3=Illegal state, maybe a previous connection was not properly closed. mailarchive.server.connectionStatus.description.-4=Unexpected exception occurred, check logs for more details. mailarchive.server.connectionStatus.description.-5=Folder was not found, check it exists and is correctly spelled. mailarchive.server.connectionStatus.description.-6=Unknown host : check host name is correctly spelled, and that this host is accessible from this server. mailarchive.server.connectionStatus.description.-7=An unknown error occurred, check logs for more details. mailarchive.server.connectionStatus.description.-8=Invalid Configuration # Lists mailarchive.list.table.headers.displayName=Display Name mailarchive.list.table.headers.pattern=Pattern mailarchive.list.table.headers.Tag=Tag mailarchive.list.table.headers.color=Colour mailarchive.list.table.headers.listId=List-ID mailarchive.list.table.headers._actions=Actions # Types mailarchive.type.table.headers.displayName=Display Name mailarchive.type.table.headers.name=Name mailarchive.type.table.headers.patternsList=Pattern(s) mailarchive.type.table.headers.icon=Icon mailarchive.type.table.headers._actions=Actions
